title: Chami Match - Recognize the Color!
subtitle: Recognize the Color!
description: A simple and fun color recognition training game!

standard.name: Standard Mode
standard.description: Match the color you see on the left

contextual.name: Contextual Mode
contextual.description: Match the central color surrounded by similar colors - a harder challenge!
contextual.instructions: Choose the color that matches the center square

relative.name: Value Difference Mode
relative.description: Determine the brightness difference between two colors
relative.instructions: Use the slider to indicate how different the brightness of these colors is (1-100)

color.name: Image Color Mode
color.description: Match colors from real images - test your color perception in context!
color.instructions: Choose the color that matches the circle in the image

recall.name: Recall Mode
recall.description: Test your color memory - see a color briefly and then recall it
recall.instructions: Memorize the color before it disappears, then select the matching color

errorBoundary.title: Oops, something went wrong!
